creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
The user/group/... profile forms have encoding problems. Looks like ISO-8859-1
vs. UTF-8:

Test äöü

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
The .iml file contains the invalid characters:

<name>Aliceäöü</name>

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
The problem was caused by using request.get() instead of request.getParameter()
in the admin area flowscripts.

Fixed in revision 600928.
